info.title: FabricAdminClient
info.description: Operation status operation endpoints and objects.

get.description: Get the status of a compute fabric operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription.The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: computeOperationResult
parameters.description: Id of a compute fabric operation.

get.description: Get the status of a network fabric operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription.The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: networkOperationResult
parameters.description: Id of a network fabric operation.

ApplicationOperationResultParameter.name: applicationOperationResult
ApplicationOperationResultParameter.description: Id of an infra role operation.

ComputeOperationResultParameter.name: computeOperationResult
ComputeOperationResultParameter.description: Id of a compute fabric operation.

NetworkOperationResultParameter.name: networkOperationResult
NetworkOperationResultParameter.description: Id of a network fabric operation.

StorageOperationResultParameter.name: storageOperationResult
StorageOperationResultParameter.description: Id of a storage fabric operation.
